name: ZCleaner (Lukas_P)
description:
There's no Tutorial yet!

W, A, S, D ---> Movement, Lshift ---> Sprinting, R ---> Reload, E ---> Interact

L Mousebutton ---> Shoot, RMouseButton ---> Aim

Keep an eye out for rays of light in the sky to find upgrades and ammo stations!

Enjoy the music room :D
